# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="55a08-102">Chyba 550/553 v službe Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="55a08-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="55a08-103">Keď ste mimo domova a pošlite e-mail z pripojeného konta pomocou Outlook.com, e-mailovej správy by mohli vrátiť s 550, 553 a zakázaným prenosom chybové hlásenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="55a08-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="55a08-104">Skontrolujte [Nastavenie synchronizácie e-mailové](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) **nastavenia**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="55a08-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="55a08-105">> **Zobraziť všetky Outlook nastavenia** > **Mail** > **synchronizáciu e-mailu**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="55a08-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="55a08-106">Uistite sa, že vaša predvolená z adresy je rovnaký ako názov domény email.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="55a08-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="55a08-107">Ak máte vlastnú doménu e-mailu zahrnuté, zmeniť na outlook.com, live.com alebo hotmail.com adresu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="55a08-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
